text:
If I am not mistaken, seems there is an error in the “INTERIM CLINICAL GUIDANCE FOR PATIENTS SUSPECTED OF/CONFIRMED WITH #COVID19 IN BELGIUM”
500mg #Chloroquine phosphate=300mg CQ base
So, I think there should be no 500 then 300mg, just 500mg q12h till end
https://t.co/j0lvnUnOnJ https://t.co/2Y6SXOcMz7
